home.title: Astro Starter
home.description: A starter template built with Astro, Svelte, TailwindCSS, Better Auth, and Drizzle ORM. Get started with authentication, database integration, and a modern UI.

feature1.title: Static + SSR + Svelte
feature1.description: Build static or server-side rendered pages with client-side hydration.

feature2.title: TailwindCSS + Shadcn UI
feature2.description: Quickly build modern, responsive, and accessible UI components.

feature3.title: Authentication
feature3.description: Complete authentication and authorization flow with Better Auth.

feature4.title: Database Integration
feature4.description: SQLite database with Drizzle ORM for type-safe database operations.
